revised_title: The Chemical Transformation of Aniline-Red into Aniline-Blue
tldr: The author investigates the chemical transformation of aniline-red into aniline-blue, a process that has significant industrial implications. The transformation involves heating rosaniline with an excess of aniline or rosaniline salts with salts of aniline, resulting in a blue color. The author also explores the properties and reactions of the newly formed aniline-blue compound.
